attributes.action: Stop the jobcentre plus from forcing people to apply for work they haven't got any training or experance to do.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when I was on JSA and new deal all the jobcentre wanted was to rush you through the system and force you to apply for jobs that was a complete waste of time. Like applying for jobs that I didn't know how to do and the employer knew i didn't. IE forcing me to apply for a bricklayers job when I am a qualified PC Tecnician.
